error.discorddark.bot_interface_missing: The Discord bot interface has not been created, has the API token been set?
error.discorddark.name_required: This command requires a name to be inputted
error.discorddark.no_send_methods: No send methods have been configured
config.discorddark.bot_token.tooltip: API token of a bot from the Discord Developer Portal
Play sounds triggered by other players
config.discorddark.backend_channel_id.to: Channel used by the backend for image storage (muting it is recommended)
config.discorddark.methods.tooltip: Send methods can be invoked by using the [send] command, and can be customised to include specific information
config.discorddark.method.identifier.too: The keyword used to invoke this method with the [send] command
config.discorddark.method.use_dimension_: The embed will be coloured based on the player's dimension
config.discorddark.method.include_name.t: Show the name inputted with the command as the embed's title
config.discorddark.method.include_player: Show the name and icon of the player as the embed's author
config.discorddark.method.include_screen: Take a screenshot and display it as the embed's image
Use inline fields for the embed
config.discorddark.method.require_name.t: Require a name to be inputted with the command
config.discorddark.method.notify.tooltip: Notify other players in chat when triggered (they do not need this mod)
config.discorddark.method.hide_hand.tool: Hide the player hand in screenshots
config.discorddark.method.field_info.too: Information to be displayed in the embed's fields
config.discorddark.method.footer_info.to: Information to be displayed in the embed's footer
infotype.discorddark.name: Name
infotype.discorddark.name.tooltip: The name of the embed supplied in the command call
infotype.discorddark.coords.tooltip: The player's current X, Y, and Z coordinates
Amount of frames to wait before capturing the framebuffer
